generalInformation: Annual herb with small pink flowers. Thrives in most soils. In Sweden, traditionally, the fully ripe seed pods are used. In Asian cuisine, leaves and stems are used.
preCultivation: Directly on the site in April-May. Bury the seeds about 1 cm deep in the soil. They will germinate after 10-15 days. If you are going to harvest seed pods, they should just have started to open to be perfectly ripe.
